name: Rough In: All Mains, range pipes, clips installed & secured
Concealed Space Sprinklers & Flexible droppers Installed
Arm pieces / Under Duct pipework installed and secured
Car Stackers pipework installed & secured (if applicable)
Air Test: Pressurized air test for a period of 30 mins (if applicable)
Water Test: Pressure test to 1600Kpa for duration of 2 hours
Fit Off: Check all sprinklers have been fit off
Air Test: Pressurized air test for a period of 30 mins (if applicable)
Water Test: Pressure test to 1600Kpa for duration of 2 hours
Hydrant / Sprinkler Mains / Risers / Hose Reel
template name: Hydrant/ Sprinkler Mains / Risers / Hose Reel Checklist

name: Rough In: All Mains & isolation valves installed
Install Hydrant/ Sprinkler/Test Drain Risers & Mill Cocks
Sprinkler Floor Control Valves installed and secured
Fit Off: Check all millcock clearances/angles/Mill cocks in closed position & Install 2400kPa pressure gauge to top of risers
Air Test: Pressurized air test for a period of 30 mins (if applicable)
Water Test: Pressure test to 1700Kpa for duration of 2 hours
FHR: All FHR been bled from excess air & proof of water
Install Sprinkler Control Valves/ Jacking Pump
Test full operation of Control Valves
Install Sprinkler Spares box, spare sprinklers & spanner
Set Jacking Pump pressure switch min 150 kPa above towns main/manifold pressure
Check for adequate drainage and test
Install Suction/ Millcocks & Hydrant, Sprinkler Boosters
Install all pipework/isolation valves to pumps
Install Pump Exhaust to designated point
Water Test all Pipework to pumps
Install all Pipework and Valves to Fire Tank
Water test all pipework to and from Water Tank
Booster Cupboard-Signage/Locks/chain/labels/plan sleeve+block plans label/block plans
Check sluice valves & water meter valves are open
Fire Pump/Tank-Fuel full, Exhaust piped, Mains power, Drains/Relief Valve piped, Water Supply on, Locks/chain/labels/pipework stickers
Adjust Bermads & float Valves to fire tanks
Test all Valves & Flow switches to ensure correct operation
Set Pressure switches to Jacking pump & alarm line
Block plans/Tactical Fire plans/FRV way finding plan
FRV Shortfall drawings & FRV stat signage ie: x2 30m hose
Fire Penetration labelled & caulked in accordance with AS 4072.1 Drawing Reference No.
Attendance - list of attendees added below
Safety: (including hazards / near misses / controls / site specific)
Plant, tools & Equipment all in good working order?
Ensure Electrical equipment test and tagged
Any new business / other comments added below
